title: Petro Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: Petro Poroshenko was born on 26 September 1965, into an ethnic Ukrainian family in Bolhrad, a primarily Bulgarian town in Ukraine's southwestern Odesa Oblast.

title: Petro Poroshenko | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: Petro Poroshenko, businessman and politician who served as president of Ukraine (2014–19). In 1996 he founded the confectionery manufacturer Roshen and became one of the richest people in Ukraine. After the ouster of Pres. Viktor Yanukovych in 2014, a snap election was held and Poroshenko won a landslide victory.

title: Petro Poroshenko Biography - Facts, Childhood, Family Life & Achievements
snippet: Petro Poroshenko is married to Maryna Perevedentseva, a cardiologist, since 1984. The couple has four children: Olexiy, Yevheniya, Oleksandra, and Mykhaylo. Maryna abstains herself from discussing politics in public and focusses on looking after ...

title: Maryna Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: Maryna and Petro Poroshenko have four children: son Olexiy (born 1985), twin daughters Yevheniia and Oleksandra (born 2000) and son Mykhailo (born 2001). The family continues to live in their private home in the historic neighborhood of Koncha-Zaspa.
